Text: The Captain of Her Heart:  Taken from their 1985 album "Blue", the song is a ballad about a girl who stops waiting for her absent lover to return.

Text: The Captain of Her Heart:  The song also made Double the first Swiss act to hit the Top 40 in the Billboard Hot 100.
